com.google.googlejavaformat

类 Doc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.googlejavaformat.Doc
  • 直接已知子类:
    Doc.Break, Doc.Token

    public abstract class Doc
extends Object
    JavaInputAstVisitor outputs a sequence of Ops using OpsBuilder. This linear sequence is then transformed by DocBuilder into a tree-structured Doc. The top-level Doc is a Level, which contains a sequence of Docs, including other Levels. Leaf Docs are Doc.Tokens, representing language-level tokens; Toks, which may also represent non-token Input.Toks, including comments and other white-space; Spaces, representing single spaces; and Doc.Breaks, which represent optional line-breaks.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Doc.Break
      A leaf node in a Doc for an optional break.
      static class  Doc.FillMode
      Each Doc.Break in a Level is either Doc.FillMode.UNIFIED or Doc.FillMode.INDEPENDENT.
      static class  Doc.State
      State for writing.
      static class  Doc.Token
      A leaf Doc for a token.

        Make breaking decisions for a Doc.
        参数:
